verses.text:
Jerusalem, first and last,
O church of God, arise!
Thy warfare time is nearly past,
Lift up thy drooping eyes.

Behold thy King approaches thee,
Upon the clouds of heaven;
To set his chosen people free,
For whom his life was given.

Look up, ye saints, lift up your heads,
Redemption draweth nigh;
Soon shall ye leave these earthly beds,
And meet him in the sky.

The trump of God shall wake the dead,
That sleep in Jesus' name;
A glorious body in their stead,
Shall rise without a stain.

Then we who live, and remain here,
Shall meet them in the air;
And ever with our Saviour dear,
Shall rest from every care.

O glorious day! O blessed hope!
O prize of faith divine!
Lord, bear thy waiting people up,
To realms of light to shine.
